class="text_word">Has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">furrowed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">higher </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">left </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">white </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" document.title: The color of the grave is green
